message.content:
I need to identify the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period, which is essentially the "Cost of Goods Sold" (COGS) in the income statement.

Looking at the financial statement provided, I can see the income statement includes a specific line item for "Cost of Goods Sold" with a value of 20,200,000.00.

This represents the carrying amount of inventories that were sold during the reporting period from December 31, 2023 to February 5, 2024.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '20200000.00'} }
```
